description: Focus on a single, satisfying action repeated with different subjects. The key is perfect audio-visual sync and sensory satisfaction.

visual.prompt_modifiers: macro photography, ultra-slow motion, pristine detail, vibrant colors, perfect lighting, studio quality

audio.sfx_palette: hyper-crisp, high-fidelity satisfying sounds (slices, cracks, pops, crunches)

scenes.llm_prompt_for_script: N/A - This is purely visual/auditory content with no narration.

generative_video_prompts.prompt: Perfect presentation shot of pristine {subject_type}. Example: 'A perfect, ripe {fruit_name} on a cutting board with a razor-sharp knife positioned nearby'. Studio lighting, macro detail, anticipation building. {global_visual_modifiers}

music_cue.dynamic: Subtle ambient tone, building slight anticipation

sfx.description: Gentle placement sound of object or tool

scenes.llm_prompt_for_script: N/A - This is purely visual/auditory content with no narration.

generative_video_prompts.prompt: Ultra-slow motion slice through {subject_type}. A razor-sharp knife cleanly cuts through in one smooth motion. Capture every detail: the blade entering, the clean separation, any juice or particles, the perfect cross-section reveal. Maximum visual satisfaction. {global_visual_modifiers}

music_cue.dynamic: Minimal, allowing the slice sound to be the star

sfx.description: THE SLICE - extremely crisp, high-fidelity cut sound perfectly synced to the visual. The most satisfying {subject_type} cutting sound possible.
Gentle settling sound as pieces separate

scenes.llm_prompt_for_script: N/A - This is purely visual/auditory content with no narration.

generative_video_prompts.prompt: Close-up reveal of the perfect cross-section of the sliced {subject_type}. Show the internal structure, textures, colors, and patterns. Camera slowly pulls back to show the complete cut. Perfect lighting reveals every detail. {global_visual_modifiers}

sfx.description: Soft, satisfying completion sound or gentle exhale
